metadata.title: CVE-2020-11936 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
gdbus setgid privilege escalation

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11936` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
apport-gtk - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
apport-kde - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
apport-noui - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
apport-retrace - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
apport-valgrind - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
dh-apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
python-apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
python-problem-report - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
python3-apport - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
python3-problem-report - 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16').
